javadoc: A task that executes a command in separate thread, not in the Swing Thread

methods.name: <init>

params.name: obj
params.comment: the domain object to be modified by this task.

methods.javadoc: Returns the Domain Object associated with this Task
methods.name: getDomainObject
methods.comment: Returns the Domain Object associated with this Task

methods.javadoc:
Returns command associated with this task
@return background command
methods.name: getCommand
methods.comment: Returns command associated with this task

methods.javadoc: Mark this task as done queue processing.
methods.name: setDoneQueueProcessing
methods.comment: Mark this task as done queue processing.

methods.javadoc:
@return true if task is still pending or actively processing and can
         process new follow-on commands via the task manager.
methods.name: isDoneQueueProcessing

return.comment:
true if task is still pending or actively processing and can
         process new follow-on commands via the task manager.

name: BackgroundCommandTask
comment: A task that executes a command in separate thread, not in the Swing Thread
